Paragraph: Remarkably , the DTPD acceptor moiety effectively widens the light absorption range of the polymers up to ∼ 900 nm while positioning their HOMO and LUMO levels in the optimal range , i.e.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid "Material Name" entities:

| Material Name |
| --- |

The other entities mentioned in the paragraph, "HOMO" and "LUMO", do not clearly refer to material names and have been removed from the table.

PV.content:

Paragraph: Remarkably , the DTPD acceptor moiety effectively widens the light absorption range of the polymers up to ∼ 900 nm while positioning their HOMO and LUMO levels in the optimal range , i.e.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

The other entities mentioned in the paragraph, "HOMO" and "LUMO", refer to energy levels in molecular orbitals and do not clearly refer to material properties. Therefore, they are not included in the table.
